summary: WAS DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AND THE ESC LIGHT CANE ON CAR STARTED GOING EVERY WHICH WAY ON IT ON !! I STARTED GOING IN THE OTHER LANE WHILE I WAS DRIVING AND ALMOST WRECKED !! LUCKILY I WAS ABLE TO PULL IT OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD !! IT IS NOT DRIVEABLE!! HAD TO CALL AAA TO COME TOW MY VEHICLE HOME !!
